classificationLevel.description: Whether masking was due to classification level.

context.description: Additional context (e.g., "Matched global rule: PII Protection").

maskingRuleId.description: The masking rule ID that matched (if applicable).

semanticTypeIcon.description: Icon associated with the semantic type (if any).

semanticTypeId.description: The semantic type that triggered masking (e.g., "SSN", "email", "phone").
